column2: Found in the final chest of Celestial Challenge or by completing Lunar New Year achievements. Grants the bearer the right to purchase additional discounted lucky envelopes.
Complete the achievement Trials of Koda Mastery.
Racing in the New Year: Silver
Double-click to open. Contains a Gilded Reliquary of the Raven, a Sweet Campfire Treat, and a 32-slot bag.
Receive Special Black Lion Green Dyes
<c=@flavor>Magic! It's like the frosting on a giant misty cake. Made of pistols. That burn blue. Just like Mom used to make."
Celebrate the New Year of the Rat
Use to unlock exclusive Black Lion Chest green dyes, or use to combine several canisters and upgrade their rarity.
Gain stacks of <c=@abilitytype>Battle Scars</c> while in combat.
<c=@flavor>Since Ryland had to face down Branded without his pauldrons, I've acquired a portable anvil so we never have that problem again."</c>"
Open the final chest of the Celestial Challenge in Divinity's Reach.
<c=@flavor>Melted snow makes a great solvent for tonics, so you'd think melted eternal ice would be better. But the stuff doesn't melt! However, I can powder it and make a suspension..."</c>"
Use to unlock exclusive Black Lion Chest green dyes, or use to combine several canisters and upgrade their rarity.
<c=@flavor>Some charr get very...excited about their gladiatorial events."</c>"
Upgrade Special Black Lion Green Dye Canisters
Chest[s] of the Bjora Marches Explorer
<c=@flavor>Ever since the ghost incident, Ranoah has been underfoot in the motorpool. She has aptitude but needs honing. Recommend we station her with Iron for a while."
Use to gain the Black Lion Chest exclusive Green Lion Dye.

This will replace the appearance of any back item and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe. 

This backpack skin has no stats of its own.
Healing Increase to Others per 100 Vitality
Take to the skies with the Alchemist Backpack and Glider Combo!
<c=@flavor>Our primus used to beat us with a rod to toughen us up, until one day he didn't."
Applying vulnerability to foes grants stacks of <c=@abilitytype>Battle Scars</c>. The healing from Battle Scars is increased while you are below the health threshold.

Double-click to wear this outfit.

Seize the Awkward! Reach out to your friends in need.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.
<c=@flavor>Some charr make small braids of their lover's fur to carry with them.</c>
